about_the_game:
Rusty Junkyard Simulator is an exciting car restoration and junkyard management game where you transform old, rusty cars into valuable treasures. Collect, dismantle, restore, and sell abandoned vehicles for profit. This game is perfect for those passionate about vehicle restoration, car customization, and junkyard management!

Let the Excitement Begin!


Explore a vast open world to find junk cars. Discover abandoned vehicles in marketplaces, neighborhoods, and remote locations. Dismantle them to gather the best parts, and use these parts to repair and modify the cars back to their former glory. Every car opens the door to a new adventure in automotive engineering and creativity.

Boost Your Profits!


Sell the restored cars at the best prices to grow your business. Buy more cars, restore them, and expand your junkyard empire. Each sale increases your wealth and reputation, making you the biggest car dealer in town. Develop your negotiation skills and become a master in the art of car trading.

Join the Races!


Participate in thrilling races with your restored and modified cars. Experience the excitement of speed and competition. Winning races will enhance your reputation, attracting more customers to your business. Show off your engineering prowess and driving skills on the racetrack.

Create Your Own World!

Decorate your office and home with unique items to create a space that's truly yours. Enhance your workspace with functional and aesthetic upgrades, making your business more appealing. Manage your social life by interacting with other characters, building relationships, and participating in community events.

Rusty Junkyard Simulator combines various mechanics such as finding junk cars, dismantling them, collecting parts, restoring vehicles, modifying them, buying and selling cars, racing, and decorating your shop and home. Experience the adrenaline rush of bringing rusty, abandoned vehicles back to life and turning them into valuable masterpieces. Turn rust into riches and build your reputation as a top car restorer and racer!

Key Features


  • Discover and collect a wide variety of junk cars in an open world.
  • Dismantle vehicles to find rare and valuable parts.
  • Restore and customize cars to their former glory.
  • Buy and sell cars to expand your junkyard empire.
  • Participate in thrilling car races to showcase your skills.
  • Decorate and upgrade your office and home.
  • Engage with other characters and build your social network.
  • Manage your junkyard business and become the ultimate car restoration expert.
  • Dive into the world of Rusty Junkyard Simulator and experience the ultimate combination of car restoration, customization, and junkyard management. Turn forgotten rust buckets into automotive masterpieces and build your legacy as the best in the business!

name: Rusty Junkyard Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Collect junk cars, dismantle them for parts, and restore them to their former glory. Experience the thrill of transforming rusty vehicles into valuable assets, selling them for profit, or racing your restored cars. Turn rust into riches and build your reputation as a top car restorer and racer!
